# Installing Squadrats grid on your Garmin device.

1. Download an IMG file for the area of your interest. 
2. Copy the IMG file to the storage area of your Garmin device
- manual for [Garmin Edge](https://www.dcrainmaker.com/2019/08/how-to-install-free-maps-on-your-garmin-edge.html) headunits
- manual for [Garmin watches](https://www.dcrainmaker.com/2019/08/how-to-installing-free-maps-on-your-garmin-fenix-5-plus-forerunner-945-or-marq-series-watch.html)

## Pre-made areas

### Large squares only (compatible with StatsHunters, VeloViewer and Squadrats)
[ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º Europe](europe/squadrats-europe.img)

### Large and small squares (for Squadrats users)
